text: Maurik is a town in the Dutch province of Gelderland. It is a part of the municipality of Buren, and lies about 8 km north of Tiel. Maurik was a separate municipality until 1999, when it was merged with Buren. In 2001, the town of Maurik had 2823 inhabitants. The built-up area of the town was 0.60 km², and contained 1086 residences.Statistics Netherlands (CBS), Bevolkingskernen in Nederland 2001 . (Statistics are for the continuous built- up area). The statistical area "Maurik", which also can include the peripheral parts of the village, as well as the surrounding countryside, has a population of around 4100.Statistics Netherlands (CBS), Statline: Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2003-2005. As of 1 January 2005. == Gallery == Image:Maurik, weiden met koeien bij het Eiland van Maurik IMG 2470 2019-09-15 12.52.jpg|near Eiland van Maurik, panorama with cows Image:Maurik, kerk in straatzicht foto8 2011-05-14 16.09.jpg|Maurik, church in the street ==References== ==External links== * Map of the former municipality, around 1868.
